title: Brewers Beer Bar
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Pizza, Western, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A pizza/beer place with three vegan pizzas on the menu using vegan via life cheese. Creative flavors including mushroom bottom spread instead of tomato sauce. Beer selection changes weekly. Beer tasting. Try the tomato sauce, fresh avocado, roasted cauliflower, almonds, lemon and hazelnut dressing pizza. All dough is artisan sourdough.
